subject: Horse Racing
Horses
lead_paragraph: Azeri, a former Horse of the Year, was still the property of Michael Paulson after a bid of $4.4 million fell short of the owner’s reserve price. Azeri, an 11-year-old mare in foal to another Horse of the Year, Ghostzapper, was expected to be the highlight of the first day of Keeneland’s horses of all ages sale. Instead, her failure to meet the reserve price underscored the effect the national economic crisis is having on the thoroughbred business.
